src:
Gara-gara Jisoo dan Jennie 'BLACKPINK', Snack Malaysia Ini Laku Keras di Korea
06 Nov 2019, 11:57 by Yenny Mustika Sari - detikFood


Foto: Istimewa

Jakarta - Snack 'Super Ring' favorit member Blackpink yaitu Jisoo dan Jennie jadi laku keras di Korea. Bahkan snack asal Malaysia itu sampai sold out!Dua orang member Blackpink yaitu Jisoo dan Jennie tengah menjadi pembicaraan beberapa hari ini karena membuat penjualan Super Ring meningkat, bahkan sampai habis terjual di Korea. Snack ini menjadi viral karena saat itu Jisoo dan Jennie sedang membuat video berbelanja snack di salah satu 7-Eleven di Malaysia. Keduanya menyebut kalau Super Ring adalah yang Jennie cari-cari selama ini.Dalam video tersebut, Jisoo dan Jennie berbelanja beberapa camilan. Mereka mengelilingi 7-Eleven tersebut dan saat berada di tempat snack ringan, Jennie sibuk mencari snack 'Super Ring' yang ia sukai. Saat melihat salah satu snack, Jennie mengatakan kalau salah satu snack itu mirip dengan 'Super Ring'.Namun akhirnya Jennie juga menemukan snack 'Super Ring' yang ia cari-cari bahkan sebelumnya ia sudah membicarakannya dengan Jisoo di mobil. Jisoo dan Jennie tak bisa menyembunyikan kegembiraan mereka, apalagi Jennie yang setengah berteriak karena saking senangnya.Baca Juga: Langsing dan Cantik, 4 Member Blackpink Buka Rahasia Soal Dietnya Jennie mengatakan pada Jisoo, "Jisoo, kita menemukannya! Kita menemukan snack itu! Lihat ini!" Terlihat sekali ekspresi bahagia dari Jennie yang sangat menandakan kalau snack 'Super Ring' itu adalah snack favoritnya. Makanan ini berbentuk cincin dengan rasa manis gurih karena keju yang berlimpah.Jennie juga menjelaskan kalau ia menyukai snack itu ketika berkunjung ke Singapura, ia mendapatkan hadiah snack tersebut dan ia langsung menyukainya. Karenanya saat berkunjung ke Malaysia, ia sangat mencari-cari Super Ring dan ternyata di Malaysia juga dijual.


Foto: Twitter

Karena video singkat itu, akhirnya snack tersebut dijual di Korea seharga 1.200 won atau Rp. 14.533,-. Selain habis terjual, snack tersebut menjadi perbincangan di Twitter. Beberapa penggemar Blackpink membicarakan tentang snack itu.


Foto: Twitter @BLINK_JCLC

Cuitan dari akun twitter @BLINK_JCLC ini mendapat respons langsung dari penggemar Blackpink yang ada di Malaysia. Ia pun membagikan postingan tersebut dan mengatakan kalau snack favorit Malaysia itu dijual juga di Korea dengan harga yang mahal. Akun @moonstarbyulie lantas menambahkan "Jisoo & Jennie impact."


Foto: Twitter @moonstarbyulie

Baca Juga: Ini Dia Bukti Kalau Member Blackpink Pintar Memasak Simak Video "Doyan Ngemil? Yuk Berburu Aneka Kuliner Lezat di Kota Tua!"[Gambas:Video 20detik](yms/adr)
text:
Because of Jisoo and Jennie 'BLACKPINK', this Malaysian snack is selling well in Korea
Nov 6 2019, 11:57 by Yenny Mustika Sari - detikFood


Photo: Special

Jakarta - Blackpink members' favorite 'Super Ring' snacks, Jisoo and Jennie, are selling well in Korea. Even the Malaysian snack was sold out! Two Blackpink members, Jisoo and Jennie, have been in talks for a few days because they have increased Super Ring sales, even sold out in Korea. This snack became viral because at that time Jisoo and Jennie were making a snack shopping video at one of 7-Eleven in Malaysia. Both of them mentioned that the Super Ring was what Jennie had been looking for all this time. In the video, Jisoo and Jennie shop for some snacks. They surrounded the 7-Eleven and while at the snack bar, Jennie was busy looking for the 'Super Ring' snack she liked. When she saw one of the snacks, Jennie said that one of the snacks was similar to 'Super Ring'. But finally Jennie also found the 'Super Ring' snack that she was looking for even before she had talked about it with Jisoo in the car. Jisoo and Jennie could not hide their excitement, especially Jennie who was half screaming because she was so happy. Also Read: Slim and Beautiful, 4 Blackpink Members Unlock the Secrets of the Diet Problem Jennie told Jisoo, "Jisoo, we found it! We found the snack! Look at this! ! " Looks very happy expression from Jennie that really indicates that the 'Super Ring' snack is her favorite snack. This ring-shaped food with a savory sweet taste because of the abundant cheese. Jennie also explained that if she liked the snack when visiting Singapore, she got the snack gift and she immediately liked it. Therefore, when visiting Malaysia, he was very looking for Super Ring and it turned out in Malaysia was also sold.


Photo: Twitter

Because of the short video, the snack was finally sold in Korea for 1,200 won or Rp. 14,533. Besides being sold out, the snack became a conversation on Twitter. Some Blackpink fans talk about the snack.


Photo: Twitter @BLINK_JCLC

The tweet from the @BLINK_JCLC Twitter account received a direct response from Blackpink fans in Malaysia. He also shared the post and said that Malaysia's favorite snack was also sold in Korea at a high price. The @moonstarbyulie account then added "Jisoo & Jennie impact."


Photo: Twitter @moonstarbyulie
